title: Pokemon Scarlet & Violet: Evolving Tadbulb into Bellibolt

steps.title: Catch a Tadbulb.
steps.content: Catch a Tadbulb. Tadbulb can be caught in many areas in Paldea: [1] X Research source South Province : Area One, Area Two, Area Three, Area Four, Area Five East Province : Area One, Area Two, Area Three West Province : Area Two North Province : Glaseado Mountain

steps.title: Obtain a Thunder Stone.
steps.content: Obtain a Thunder Stone. You must use a thunder Stone to evolve Tadbulb into a Bellibolt. You can get Thunder Stones in a few locations in game: [2] X Research source After earning 3 Gym Badges you can buy them for 3,000 Pokédollars at Delibird Presents Rewards from 1-5 star Tera Raid Battles Sparkling overworld items in East Province Area Three Hidden items in Levincia, Casseroya Lake, and West Province Area One As a reward for catching 30 Pokémon in the Pokédex

steps.title: Use a Thunder Stone on your Tadbulb.
steps.content: Use a Thunder Stone on your Tadbulb. Once you've gotten a Tadbulb, use a Thunder Stone on it. Your Tadbulb will evolve into the Electric-Type Bellibolt. [3] X Research source If you're having trouble getting a Thunder Stone or don't want to spend the money on one, you can also find Bellibolt in the wild. Bellibolt can be found in South Province Area Four and Area Six, East Province Area Three and Tagtree Thicket, West Province Area Tow and Area Three, North Province Area Three and Glaseado Mountain. You can also find a special Bellibolt in Casseroya Lake with a Water Tera Type . [4] X Research source
